item.title: Designing a feature flag system with Firebase
item.description: Feature flags allow developers to enable and disable features without making changes to code and re-deploying the application. I have designed & developed the feature flag system at work for https://web.kisi.io. It has been 3 years since I wrote the first commit, and it’s still in production.
